participant_1.background: i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i love cats and have two cats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.background: i hate math class. my brother is older than me. i am on the soccer team. i ride the bus to school. i'm 13 years old.

content.text: Hey! How is your day? I like to make my own collection of matches.
